title: Happy T-Day
author: JGray
text: Not all of our readers celebrate Thanksgiving but hopefully you all have something to be thankful for, today! We'll return to our regularly scheduled comic next Monday. In the meanwhile, please enjoy this pinup so lovingly done by Keith!

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: There's no thanksgiving over here, but happy thanksgiving all the same By the way, dog-boy fills that uniform pretty well!
